title: Economic liberalization and migration in China

content.question: In China, economic liberalization policies have resulted in which of the following?

choices.label: The nationalization of industries and a decrease in state corruption
The significant migration of the people from one region to another
A reduction of inequality between urban and rural areas
An increase in the role of the state in determining production

content.answer: The significant migration of the people from one region to another

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
